decks.notes: The deck focuses on combining aggressive creatures with powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The commanders Yoshimaru and Kraum provide flexibility and card advantage to help maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck includes a mix of removal, counterspells, and creatures with keywords like haste and flying to deal damage quickly. The mana base is optimized to ensure timely casting of spells and to support the color requirements of the deck. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Malcolm, Arbaaz, and Adeline, along with versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares, allows for a proactive playstyle that aims to win the game through consistent and fast aggression.

This deck focuses on utilizing Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander to lead an aggressive strategy. The deck includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and True-Name Nemesis, along with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Spell Queller to control the game. Additionally, the deck features powerful instant removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt to maintain board presence and tempo advantage. The mana base is designed to support a consistent game plan, with fetch lands like Misty Rainforest and Flooded Strand to ensure mana fixing. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and disrupt opponents' strategies to secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing control elements to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also utilizing graveyard recursion to bring back powerful creatures and spells. Ertai Resurrected serves as the commander, allowing for additional control options and the ability to sacrifice creatures to counter spells. The deck includes a variety of counterspells, removal, and draw spells to control the game state. It also includes powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Murktide Regent to dominate the battlefield. The mana base is designed to support the control strategy, with a mix of dual lands and fetch lands. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to control the game through disruption and efficient removal, while also leveraging graveyard recursion for additional value.

This aggressive deck revolves around using Ketramose, the New Dawn as the commander to quickly overwhelm opponents with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The deck includes a variety of removal spells to control the board and protect your own creatures, along with powerful creatures like Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to dominate the battlefield. In addition, there are cards like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach to disrupt your opponent's strategy and keep them on the back foot. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruption, this deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain control throughout the game.
